modName: Pine Tree Fix for Complete Solitude - USLEEP Fix
summary: This version of Nesbit's fix contains an esp file with edited masters, so it is compatible with USLEEP instead of the USKP. If a fix for the USKP is needed, please check out Nesbit's original patch.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][color=#ff7700][size=5]Pine Tree Fix - USLEEP Version[/size][/color][/b][/u]
[b][color=#ffff00][size=4]Useful for Complete Solitude, TRUE CITY and Solitude Reborn[/size][/color][/b]

Hey guys!
This little modremoves pines added in front of Solitude by the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url], since they conflict with the extended city of the mods "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36061/?]Complete Solitude[/url]", "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60430/?]TRUE CITY[/url]" and "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63685/?]Solitude Reborn[/url]".

This fix was created by Nesbit, I just changed the master of his file to USLEEP instead of the USKP, since I need that change myself and figured others might need it too.
If you find yourself using USKP and need this patch, you can find Nesbit's original file [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53890/?]HERE[/url].
Thus: [b]All Credit goes to Nesbit for this patch!

[/b]Also, this fix contains some files to fix grey faces in combination with Complete Solitude, which Nesbit found. I had no of these issues myself and I'm using Solitude Reborn, but I left the fix in, just in case somebody needs it.

I hope I could help USLEEP users with this.

-Shad0w
author: Nesbit and Shad0wlife

files.name: Solitude Extensions Pine Tree Fix for USLEEP
